ygData.msgSnippet: Calling all transformers, repeat, calling all transformers within the Chivtron base area. This is Recon. We have an emergency on our hands bots. A descendent

"Calling all transformers, repeat, calling all transformers within the 
Chivtron base area. This is Recon. We have an emergency on our hands bots. A 
descendent of Unicron is coming this way and he means business. This new 
force is Terrorbot, with a black spark formed of pure evil, believed to be 
immortal. Please help me, please help me at once. There are innocents here, 
children, their relatives. Somebody help us!"
